alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Southern San Luis Valley; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 22 at 4:04AM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central and southern portions of the San Luis Valley, as well as much of the southeastern Colorado plains. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
